name: The Happiness Planner
slogan: Mastering Happiness & Success - One Day At A Time
description:
Inspirational planning & journaling platform designed to help you master your inner world and become happy, whole, and fulfilled.

Our platform utilizes CBT techniques to enable you to empower your own mind, rewire your patterns, and move through inner blocks to create the life of your dreams.

Availalbe as iOs, Android, and Desktop app.

team.title: Founder & CEO
team.name: Mo Seetubtim
team.bioHtml: Founder of The Happiness Planner® | Building the no.1 personal development platform

jobs.title: Technical Co-Founder
jobs.description:
Our mission is to help people master their inner world and become happy, whole, and fulfilled. 

We are now getting ready to fundraise and want to close this round by summer. Our app is pretty much 80% complete but we have grand ambitions for the future as we want to build the biggest personal development platform in the world. So far, we have built a massive following through our paper products with over 300,000 email subscribers and social media fans.

Now The Happiness Planner app is at the point where it's ready to be fully marketed and advertised. I'm now looking for a co-founder to come in and lead the technical aspects of the business as we fundraise and grow.

The ideal technical co-founder must be passionate about personal developement, psychology, cognitive behavioral therapy, and aspire to help millions of people change their lives through what you create. If you feel that our company's vision aligns with your life's purpose and think you could help us become the next Headspace, please get in touch.

Bonus point if you could help us fundraise. The sooner we do this, the earlier we can get the ball rolling.

The Happiness Planner app is now available as an iOs, Android, and desktop app.

More info at:
https://thehappinessplanner.com
https://happinessplannerapp.com
https://thehappinessplanner.io
